sentences.en: A writ was served on the firm in respect of their unpaid bill.
sentences.cn: 公司由于欠账而收到了传票.
安妮是他的不支薪的秘书.

sentences.en: Apart from a small team of paid staff, the organisation consists of unpaid volunteers.
sentences.cn: 除了一小组受薪员工外，这个组织里都是不领报酬的志愿者。
医生过度加班却无报酬.

sentences.en: Even unpaid work for charity is better than nothing.
sentences.cn: 即便是给慈善机构做义工也比什么都不做要好。

sentences.en: He does a lot of unpaid work.
sentences.cn: 他常干许多不拿报酬的工作.

sentences.en: I used all of the money to take care of my unpaid bills.
sentences.cn: 我用全部的钱都来偿付帐单.

sentences.en: The bank requires the customer to pay interest on the unpaid part of the charges.
sentences.cn: 银行要求顾客付清当月全部购货款利息.

sentences.en: The bills remained unpaid because of a dispute over the quality of the company's work.
sentences.cn: 由于对那家公司的工作质量有争议，账单还未付清。

sentences.en: The taxman caught up with him and demanded £7,000 in unpaid taxes.
sentences.cn: 税收人员查到了他，要求他把未缴纳的7,000英镑税款交上。

sentences.en: The unpaid volunteers do the work because they love it.
sentences.cn: 这些义务工作的志愿者是因为他们喜欢这个工作才做的。

sentences.en: There is an unpaid bill of seventy - five dollars and some cents.
sentences.cn: 这里有一张应付 七十五 元几分的帐单.

sentences.en: There is an unpaid bill on my table.
sentences.cn: 我桌上有张未付的帐单.

sentences.en: They levied on his property for unpaid rent.
sentences.cn: 他们因他未付租金而扣押了他的财产.

trans.tran_cn: 未付的，（债等）未还、未缴纳的，不支付薪水服务的
trans.tran_en: an unpaid bill or debt has not been paid
